Eggplant Scanner
CONFIRM NEXT CLEAR
Set Lock Screen Set Pattern Draw An Unlock Pattern Draw Pattern Again To Confirm Release Finger When Done Pattern Recorded Your New Unlock Pattern Connect At Least 4 Dots! Wrong Pattern!
Your New Unlock Pattern Is Created! Okay!
EGGPLANT SCANNER Draw Your Pattern CAPTURE UPLOAD RECAPTURE REUPLOAD Edibility Level: PLACEHOLDER Edibility check complete! Recapture or reupload to check again, or save and go back. Hi there! Ready to check your eggplant\'s edibility? Snap a photo or upload one to get instant results! The scanned image shows optimal edibility, with no visible signs of spoilage like discoloration, texture changes, or decay. The eggplant meets the highest standards for freshness and safety, making it ideal for consumption. The scanned image shows acceptable edibility, with slight imperfections like minor soft spots or faint discoloration. The eggplant remains safe to eat and retains good quality, making it suitable for most culinary preparations. The scanned image shows moderate edibility, with visible signs of aging such as dark spots, soft patches, or mild shriveling. The eggplant is still consumable with caution, but trimming or selective use may be necessary. The scanned image shows unsafe edibility, with clear signs of spoilage like mold, extensive decay, or foul odor. The eggplant poses a health risk and does not meet safety standards, so it should be discarded immediately. It looks like the image you provided isn\'t an eggplant. Kindly try again by submitting a photo that clearly shows an eggplant, and we\'ll take another look. RETURN
